header.name: chaos/preprocessor/punctuation/hash.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines macros that expand to hash marks.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to a single hash mark.
macro.para: The hash mark preprocessing token (#) may not be used in the replacement list of a function-like macro unless it is used as the stringizing operator. This macro facilitates the introduction of the hash mark preprocessing token in such contexts.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to a double hash mark.
macro.para: The double hash mark preprocessing token (##) may not be used in the replacement list of a macro unless it is used as the token-pasting operator. This macro facilitates the introduction of the double hash mark preprocessing token in such contexts.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to the digraph hash mark.
macro.para: The digraph hash mark preprocessing token (%:) may not be used in the replacement list of a function-like macro unless it is used as the stringizing operator. This macro facilitates the introduction of the digraph hash mark preprocessing token in such contexts.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to a double digraph hash mark.
macro.para: The double digraph hash mark preprocessing token (%:%:) may not be used in the replacement list of a macro unless it is used as the token-pasting operator. This macro facilitates the introduction of the double digraph hash mark preprocessing token in such contexts.
